description: Move over, maple syrup. There’s a new pancake topping in town. And once you try HERSHEY’S Syrup on your morning pancakes, you'll never go back to your old pancakes again. (Get our recipe for fluffy flavored pancakes featuring HERSHEY’S Syrup.)
keywords: Pancake,Seafood free,Low salt,Soy free,Tree nut free,Low fat,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Fluffy Hershey’s flavoured pancakes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup Hershey’s chocolate or strawberry syrup

recipeInstructions.text: Stir flour, milk, chocolate or strawberry syrup and eggs until blended in large bowl (batter will be thin). Pour batter by 1/4 cupfuls onto hot griddle; cook until edges are dry. Turn; cook until lightly browned. Serve with "Chocolate-Maple Breakfast Syrup".
Chocolate-Maple Breakfast Syrup: Combine 1/2 cup HERSHEY'S Syrup and 1/2 cup maple syrup.
